statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({6.96}+{8.88}\right)}={31.68}\approx{31.68}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{8.88}\cdot{5.84}={51.8592}\approx{51.9}.
